metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6411 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The HandleCrashedAircraft function in aircraft_cmd.cpp in OpenTTD 0.3.6 through 1.3.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and crash) by crashing an aircraft outside of the map.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6411` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

openttd - 1.5.3-1
openttd-data - 1.5.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openttd package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.3-1').
